comments.author: CloudsBeyond

comments.text:
I just got through watching a documentary on the Watergate scandal of the 
early to mid 1970's; the scandal that drove Richard Nixon from office. As 
they talked about the 18&1/2 minute gap in one of the tapes of 
conversations that Nixon secretly recorded, and what parts of his 
conversation was erased, the light of truth became clear to me. "How 'bout 
some more beans, Mr. President??"

comments.text: You totally stole my next joke!
comments.author: TheCoolProfessor

comments.text:
I got thrown out of a church due to a pastor's jealousy over my ability to 
move people to The holy Spirit better than he could. He was preaching about 
sin and salvation when I let out a "loud wet one". The people around me 
were MOVED by the Holy Spirit. "Good GOD!!" "JESUS Christ!!" "God, have 
MERCY!!" THEY HAD TEARS IN THEIR EYES!! One elderly lady even passed out!! 
All the while, they were waving their arms about like Pentecostal 
Christians do..... and this wasn't even a Pentecostal church!!

A longtime mystery from the Watergate Era has now been solved. Remember the 
tape with the 18&1/2 minute gap?? The conversation between Nixon and White 
House Chief of Staff, H.R. Haldeman, with the contents of the tape suddenly 
and mysteriously erased?? Haldeman: "How 'bout some more beans, Mr. 
President??"

comments.text:
Actually in English polite society BOTTOM BURP is the most respectable way 
top say it or you could also say for e.g. ''He did a RUDE SMELL'' but never 
ever fart or crapped his pants etc that is just crass and undignified, only 
common ignorant people use such phrases. So in future always be correct 
(and never offend anyone or have them think you are crass) by using the 
term BOTTOM BURP primarily, or RUDE SMELL.

comments.author: Carla Flores

comments.text:
Interesting know FACT on this scene : Mel Brooks filmed it with sound, 
those actors really did bottom burp in sustained violent manner. Originally 
Mel thought he would overdub the bottom burping sounds later but during the 
first takes , the actors were able to bottom burp violently so he recorded 
it exactly as they did it.
comments.author: CloudsBeyond
